mapper.select: SELECT A.MEMBER_ID , A.MEMBER_PWD , A.MEMBER_NAME , A.MEMBER_CONTACT , A.MEMBER_NUM , A.MEMBER_BIRTHDAY , A.MEMBER_AGE , A.MEMBER_GENDER , A.MEMBER_ADDRESS , A.MEMBER_TYPE , A.MEMBER_STATUS , B.MEMBER_ID REF_MEMBER_ID , B.AUTHORITY_CODE REF_AUTHORITY_CODE , C.AUTHORITY_CODE REF_AUTHORITY_CODE2 , C.AUTHORITY_NAME , C.AUTHORITY_DESC FROM TBL_MEMBER A LEFT JOIN TBL_MEMBER_ROLE B ON (A.MEMBER_ID = B.MEMBER_ID) LEFT JOIN TBL_AUTHORITY C ON (B.AUTHORITY_CODE = C.AUTHORITY_CODE) WHERE A.MEMBER_ID = #{ username }
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{ id } AND MEMBER_STATUS = 'Y'
